actions.action: Click a product link of "Hummingbird printed t-shirt".
actions.expectedResult: The product detail page for that item is displayed.

actions.action: Select a size 'M' from the dropdown.
actions.expectedResult: Size M is chosen from the dropdown.

actions.action: Check color Black in the colour options.
actions.expectedResult: The color Black is successfully selected.

actions.action: Click "Continue shopping" or close the modal.
Click the shopping cart icon at the top of the page.
actions.expectedResult: The shopping cart page is loaded

actions.action: Verify the product name "Hummingbird printed t-shirt", selected color, and selected size are displayed in the cart.
actions.expectedResult: The product name, color, and size are correctly displayed in the cart.

actions.action: Click the "delete" link or icon next to the product line item.
actions.expectedResult: The product line item disappears from the cart.

actions.action: Verify the cart is now empty.
actions.expectedResult: A message such as "There are no more items in" is displayed.
